name: Ruka Juu
description:
Watch out! You snooze, you lose; you fumble, you fall. You could play it on the train on a journey, on a bus heading home on your bike working out. Ruka Juu (Swahili for "Jump Up".), is a fast-paced, endless, casual, action,platform,video game for mobile where the player jumps on platforms while avoiding and destroying enemies. The player score increases as the player move up without falling. The player also collects items on the platforms that earn them more points. The game features interesting gameplay tailored with a smooth experience that makes the experience enjoyable. The game also does not have intrusive ads that may interfere with your gameplay(Only one optional reward Ad is in the game, displayed on the game over scene). So if you're looking for something to help you relax, Ruka Juu has got what you need.  I hope you love it much as I did making it for you.
The artwork used in the game is courtesy of Kenney(www.kenney.nl)
Features:
• Responsive Controls
• Interesting gameplay
• Fun
• Continuous Challenge
• Wonderful sound effects
• Stunning 2D graphics
• Good Camera angles
• Lightweight
• Multiple Languages
